column1: # This file defines the mapping from <Category
#      spreadsheet to account names in the Leger file.
#      Each line is of the form:
#	Account:	account name to appear in ledger
#	Category:	gross accounting area in budget file
#      This is mapping is useful because:
#	- the budget is more fine-grained (sub-categories) than the leger
#	- different Items witin a Category can map to different Accounts
#       - it also enables us to define the order of Accounts in the ledger
# basic categories corresponding to a singe account
# categories who's items go to multiple accounts
# categories that are external to our living budget
# these entries are for accounts that should be ignored
# these entries are for other ledgers
